pages.text: A small teleporter used to travel great distances.
One of the ingredients for the warp pad, known as the warp seed, can be found in various structure loot chests such as an archaeology building.
To register and name a warp pad block, right click it and use the menu.
To use a warp pad block, stand directly on it and hit the following key: $(k:gempire.warp)$(/l)$(br2)A menu should then appear with other warp pads available for warping to.
Warp pads are currently only used for same-dimension travel, meaning you can't go from the Nether to the overworld and back. Use warp pads to mark important locations within specific dimensions.
